cards.title: Soul of the Forgotten God
body: If {SoulOfTheForgottenGod}, {HeadOfTheForgottenGod}, {ChestOfTheForgottenGod}, {ArmsOfTheForgottenGod}, and {LegsOfTheForgottenGod} are ever all in play, the Forgotten God rises. Earth is destroyed. The Heroes lose.

cards.title: SealingMists
body: At the start of the environment turn, you may destroy this card.
At the end of the environment turn, {SealingMists} deals each target 1 radiant damage.

cards.title: Enchanted Shackles
body: When {EnchantedShackles} is destroyed, play the top card of the environment deck.

cards.title: Cultist Of The Forgotten One
body: At the start of the environment turn, return a random Relic card from the environment trash to play.

cards.title: Aabria, The Forgotten Priestess
body: At the start of the environment turn, each Cultist gains 1 HP.
At the end of the environment turn, {AabriaTheForgottenPriestess} deals the X non-environment targets with the lowest HP {H-2} infernal damage, where X is the number of cultists in play.

cards.title: Zoryx, The Chosen
body: Reduce damage dealt to Relic targets by 1.
At the end of the environment turn, all relic targets gain {H} HP.
